body:
Comment 9: 
I agree with Peter. I suspect you are missing some recent changes: revision 16c14fb2fea5
and revision c32724dcea9d in particular.

Here is my session of goinstall:

C:\a\src\hello>8g -V
8g version weekly.2011-07-29 9341+

C:\a\src\hello>set GOPATH=c:\a

C:\a\src\hello>echo %GOPATH%
c:\a

C:\a\src\hello>type hello.go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
        fmt.Printf("Hello\n")
}
C:\a\src\hello>set PATH=%PATH%;c:\mingw\go\bin

C:\a\src\hello>goinstall -make=false .

C:\a\src\hello>..\..\bin\hello.exe
Hello

C:\a\src\hello>

You could wait until these fixes will appear as part of monthly release. Alternatively,
you could try and install latest version and build it yourself. If you need
instructions, I will be happy to assist.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**._ _Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
